Package <Unnamed>

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Crossbow
    Manages shooting Ping Pong balls
    Exit
    Thread that allows to exit all running programs simply using the esc button at any time
    FinalRun
    the final run class gives the set of instructions that are needed to perform the final demo.
    Follower
    Implements Obstacle avoidance
    Localizer
    Implements Localisation methods to localize at specific times Different localization methods may be used depending on how inaccurate is the odometer at the time of localization and the known environment
    LSController
    Manages All the information coming from a light sensor by filtering it and returning a filtered value.
    Main
    Contains main method Displays menu and options Runs the Robot depending on selected option
    Navigate
    The Complete set of methods that allow robot mobility at a low level of complexity
    OdoCorrection
    Corrects the odometer each time a line is crossed if conditions are right
    Odometer
    Basic odometer Also store all the sensor values for any class to call and use when necessary.
    OdometryDisplay  
    Robot
    A classe that store all the values that are likely to vary during testing It has no other purpose than to structure the code and make it adaptable and easy to access.
    Tests
    Stores all the set of instructions to run specific tests This class is mainly present to structure the code and give easy access
    USController
    Manages All the information coming from an ultra sonic sensor by filtering it and returning a filtered value.
